ISSUE.TITLE: UPS shipping plugin. Remove Access Point Economy Service and add settings to choose dimension and weight
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Plugin: Nop.Plugin.Shipping.UPS Steps to reproduce the problem: Hi! When I use UPS shipping plugin I get two errors when I proceed to checkout: UPS Access Point Economy Service shipments must have a Hold for Pickup at UPS Access Point or UPS Access Point Delivery Shipment Indication Type or must be a Return shipment. Error code : 111526 This measurement system is not valid for the selected country or territory. Error code: 111057 I have one product in my shopping cart with dimensions in CM and weight in KGS. But UPS plugin use "LBS" as default weight unit and "inches" as default dimensions for a product. (See UPSService.cs constants between lines 52 to 62) When I replace this defaults units values by CM and KGS I don't get any errors and plugin works fine. So I don't know if I miss something in NopCommerce configuration otherwise I think that the possibility to choose the default dimension and the default weight should be added in the UPS Shipping plugin configuration.
